A fight breaks out on the street and Tyler starts hitting a guy to stop it.
Plays on the car radio as Neil pulls out of the driveway with his daughter Ally.
Ally (Emily de Ravin) is lying on her bed listening to this song before Tyler calls her and they talk on the phone about their date.
Playing at the restaurant during Tyler and Ally's date.
Tyler cooks dinner for Ally at his place.
Playing at Tylers place during his date with Ally. He sprays her with water and she throws a pot of water on him. They wet each other in the shower.
The third song that plays at Tylers place during his date with Ally. Tyler tells Ally that his brother killed himself before Aidan interrupts them.
Aidan interrupts Tyler and Ally and tells them to come to the around the world party on the third floor.
Playing in the background while Ally is throwing up in the toilet.
Tyler and Aidan are on the roof. Aidan is struggling with weights.
Playing in Tyler's apartment when Ally shows up after her dad hits her.
Tyler walks over to Ally and cuts to scene of them having sex. Kissing in bed afterwards and Tyler leaves her a note.
Tyler comes back after going to the coffee diner. He tells Ally he was writing at Michael's coffee shop. Ally tells Tyler her mother was murdered.
Playing at Tylers 22nd birthday party. Aidan is dancing with Caroline.
Ally goes in to talk to Tylers sister Caroline while she's drawing. She asks if she can come to her art show.
Playing at the birthday party Caroline gets dropped too. She walks in with presents and watches the other girls laughing.
